title: Drawing, "Design for an Earring or", 1775–1800
medium:
Pen and black ink, wash
Support: off-white laid paper
inscribed: Verso, above, at left: No 12; Cica Scudi 700 di aggiuata; Volendo fare il preste disegno di dia/manti ci vuole circa 350
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for an Earring or", 1775–1800.
1775–1800. Pen and black ink, wash
Support: off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-847.
